description: From international scientific vocabulary, reflecting New Latin combining forms, from lymph- +‎ adeno +‎ -oma = lymph- +‎ adenoma.

entries.meaning: (biology, medicine, modern sense) A benign tumor (neoplasm) of lymphatic tissue.

definitionGroups.group: (biology, medicine, archaic) Any hyperplastic or neoplastic mass of lymphatic tissue.

entries.meaning: (biology, medicine, archaic) Any pseudoleukaemia, especially Hodgkin's disease.
(biology, medicine, archaic) Any malignant lymphatic tumor, including lymphosarcoma or lymphadenocarcinoma.
